summary: Antonio is a man who was born with unusually large incisors; his freakishly huge teeth make him an outcast from his peers as a child, and he attempts more than once to break off the offending choppers.
cast: Sergio Rubini|Anouk Grinberg|Tom Novembre|Anita Caprioli|Alessandra D'Elia|Fabrizio Bentivoglio|Paolo Villaggio|Claudio Ammendola|Barbara Cupisti|Massimo De Lorenzo|Olimpia Di Maio|Ruggero Dondi|Angela Goodwin|Lucia Migliucci|Elisabetta Pellini|Alice Pepe|Luca Pollini|Angelica Russo|Antonella Stefanucci|Emilio Toscano|Franco Trevisi|Riccardo Zinna
title: Denti
